item.title: Future Present Labs Partners with Puget Audio to Manufacture Premium FX Pedal Line
item.description:
SEATTLE, WA — February 16, 2026 — Future Present Labs (FPL), a Seattle-based precision CNC machining and mechatronics consulting firm, today announced a strategic manufacturing partnership with Puget Audio, an emerging boutique audio equipment manufacturer specializing in analog FX pedals for guitar and bass.

Under the agreement, FPL will serve as the primary manufacturing partner for Puget Audio’s debut pedal line, which includes three flagship products: The Overdrive ($149), The Fuzz ($129), and The Delay ($179). The pedals feature handwired analog circuitry with premium components, true bypass switching, and rugged enclosures built to withstand the demands of touring musicians.
